statements: SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, behavior_pattern FROM student_engagement WHERE behavior_pattern = 'Active';
SELECT class_id, engagement_score FROM student_engagement WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM student_engagement;
SELECT * FROM student_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE class_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT student_id, engagement_score FROM student_engagement WHERE behavior_pattern = 'positive' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC
SELECT class_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM student_engagement GROUP BY class_id ORDER BY avg_engagement_score DESC
SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE behavior_pattern = 'negative' AND engagement_score < 50
SELECT student_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_engagement_score FROM student_engagement WHERE behavior_pattern <> 'neutral' GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY max_engagement_score DESC
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT * FROM engagement_records WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY session_date
SELECT student_id, COUNT(record_id) AS total_engagements FROM engagement_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_engagements > 3
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01' ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, engagement_score, session_date FROM students JOIN engagement_records ON students.student_id = engagement_records.student_id WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT behavior_description FROM engagement_records WHERE engagement_score < 50 AND session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT student_name, behavior_description FROM students JOIN engagement_records ON students.student_id = engagement_records.student_id WHERE students.gender = 'Female' AND engagement_score >= 70 ORDER BY student_name ASC, session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT name, teacher_id FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT engagement_type FROM engagements WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_type LIKE 'positive%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT s.name, b.behavior_type FROM students s JOIN behaviors b ON s.student_id = b.student_id WHERE b.timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY b.timestamp ASC;
SELECT s.name, e.engagement_type FROM students s JOIN engagements e ON s.student_id = e.student_id WHERE e.engagement_type = 'Participation' ORDER BY s.name ASC, e.timestamp DESC;

SELECT s.name, b.behavior_type, e.timestamp FROM students s JOIN behaviors b ON s.student_id = b.student_id JOIN engagements e ON s.student_id = e.student_id ORDER BY s.name ASC, e.timestamp DESC, b.timestamp ASC;

SELECT s.name, COUNT(b.behavior_id) AS behavior_count FROM students s LEFT JOIN behaviors b ON s.student_id = b.student_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING behavior_count > 5 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC, s.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT student_id, class_grade FROM students ORDER BY class_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM students JOIN behavior ON students.student_id = behavior.student_id;
SELECT DISTINCT subject FROM grades;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender, class_grade FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY class_grade ASC;
SELECT student_name, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM students JOIN behavior ON students.student_id = behavior.student_id WHERE behavior_type = 'Absent' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, subject, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC, subject ASC;
SELECT student_name, date, status FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE status = 'Present' ORDER BY date ASC, student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, gender, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, name, engagement_score FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id, semester FROM courses WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students WHERE gender='Female' AND grade_level = 10;
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_id FROM courses WHERE capacity > 30 ORDER BY capacity ASC;

SELECT students.name, enrollments.enrollment_date, courses.course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT attendance_date, is_present FROM attendance JOIN enrollments ON attendance.enrollment_id = enrollments.enrollment_id WHERE enrollments.completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY enrollment_id DESC LIMIT 10;
